briefdescription.para: This is the main source file for the mathematical equation operations.

detaileddescription.para: This file implements the functions declared in emath.h. It consists of two classes, the Monomial class and the Polynomial class. The Monomial class implements all the functions, operators, and properties for representing and operating monomials. The Polynomial class implements all the functions, operators, and properties for representing and operating polynomials.
